attributes.action: Re-paint the front door of 10 Downing Street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Black may be the traditional colour of the PM's front door but frankly it's a bit Dickensian and dour. 

Please re-paint it a good strong colour; preferably pillar-box red or British Racing Green.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
